conclusion: Remainder inadmissible;No violation of Article 9 - Freedom of thought conscience and religion (Article 9-1 - Manifest religion or belief)
docname: CASE OF FRANCESCO SESSA v. ITALY - [Armenian Translation] by the COE Human Rights Trust Fund
judges: András Sajó;Françoise Tulkens;Guido Raimondi;Helen Keller;Isabelle Berro-Lefèvre;Paulo Pinto De Albuquerque
